alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 2:53PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hidalgo, northwestern Cameron and southwestern Willacy Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 253 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lasara Elementary School, or near Lasara, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raymondville, Elsa, Edcouch, Lyford, La Villa, Lasara, Sebastian, and Yznaga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo
